channel.title: How do i do this command
channel.description:
} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("crybow") && (playerHasItemAmount(6307, 120000)==ture)) { deleteItem(6307, getItemSlot(6307), 120000); addItem(4212, 1);
can anyone see whats wrong with this i keep getting this error
client.java:4755: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItemAmount(int,int) location: class client if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("crybow") && (playerHasItemAmount(6 307, 120000) == ture)) { ^ client.java:4755: cannot find symbol symbol : variable ture location: class client if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("crybow") && (playerHasItemAmount(6 307, 120000) == ture)) { ^
any help would be greatly recieved! thanks

item.title: How do i do this command
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

First of all…You misspelled True, and you dont even need true…Try this:
}
if(command.startsWith(“crybow”) && playerHasitem(6307, 120000) {
deleteItem(6307,120000);
addItem("4212, 1);
